questions.question: When was coffee first introduced to Timor-Leste?
Who introduced coffee to Timor-Leste?
What percentage of Timor-Leste's agricultural exports does coffee account for?
Approximately what percentage of Timorese households are involved in coffee farming?
Which of the following is NOT a main export market for Timorese coffee?
What is the approximate annual coffee export volume for Timor-Leste?
Which coffee variety is known for its lower caffeine content and complex flavor profile?
At what altitude is Arabica coffee primarily grown in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is NOT a main Arabica-growing region in Timor-Leste?
What are the typical flavor notes associated with Timorese Arabica coffee?
Which coffee variety is known for its higher caffeine content and more bitter flavor?
In which regions of Timor-Leste is Robusta coffee primarily grown?
What is the Timor Hybrid?
choices: A man-made cross between Arabica and Robusta
A naturally occurring hybrid of Arabica and Robusta
A cross between Arabica and Liberica
questions.answer: A naturally occurring hybrid of Arabica and Robusta

questions.question: When was the Timor Hybrid first discovered?
What are the key features of the Timor Hybrid?
choices: High caffeine content and bitter taste

questions.question: Which popular coffee varieties have been developed using the Timor Hybrid?
What is the primary use of the Timor Hybrid in global coffee breeding programs?
What percentage of Timor-Leste's GDP does coffee contribute?
Which of the following is NOT a challenge facing the coffee industry in Timor-Leste?
choices: Limited access to modern farming techniques

questions.question: What is the focus of recent efforts to develop Timor-Leste's coffee industry?
What is 'terroir' in the context of coffee production?
choices: A type of coffee processing method

questions.question: Which factors contribute to the unique terroir of Timorese coffee?
choices: Mountainous terrain, tropical climate, and volcanic soils
questions.answer: Mountainous terrain, tropical climate, and volcanic soils

questions.question: During which historical period did coffee production in Timor-Leste focus on quantity over quality?
What role did coffee play in Timor-Leste's post-independence economy?
choices: It became less important due to oil discoveries
It became a symbol of economic independence
It was replaced by tourism as the main export
It was abandoned in favor of manufacturing
questions.answer: It became a symbol of economic independence

questions.question: Which of the following is TRUE about coffee production in Timor-Leste?
choices: It is primarily done on large plantations

questions.question: What is the primary benefit of focusing on specialty coffee production in Timor-Leste?
choices: Higher value exports and improved farmer incomes
questions.answer: Higher value exports and improved farmer incomes

questions.question: Which coffee variety in Timor-Leste is known for its full body and low acidity?
What is the significance of coffee cooperatives in Timor-Leste?
choices: They provide support and resources to smallholder farmers
They are owned by the government
They focus exclusively on Robusta production
questions.answer: They provide support and resources to smallholder farmers

questions.question: Which international organization has been involved in supporting Timor-Leste's coffee industry?
What is the main advantage of the Timor Hybrid in coffee breeding?
